<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.MobileUtil</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Utilities to support mobile functionality</description> <name>MobileUtil</name> <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");
var MobileUtil = Class.create(); MobileUtil.prototype = {
getBannerText: function() { return gs.getProperty('glide.product.description.mobile'); },
z: null };
]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2008-11-14 01:18:15</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9893b3310a01010100d962dc8b5d33fb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>MobileUtil</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Mobile Device Support" source="com.glide.mobile">1bf081cb6d2620100acb70b3534330de</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9893b3310a01010100d962dc8b5d33fb</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>glide.maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2008-11-16 13:58:52</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>227</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
